description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for product-related endpoints in an e-commerce backend system. It includes route definitions for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting products, along with associated middleware for authentication, authorization, validation, and API documentation via Swagger annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list all active products.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a specific product by UUID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new product (admin only).

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT requests to update an existing product (admin only).

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to delete a product (admin only).
